title: Instant Halt v2
description:
Instant Halt v2
---------------

This is a small application, that will make Windows halt almost immediately.


There is no installation or setup.
You run this file, and within a relative short time, Windows will stop responding.

NO DAMAGE IS BEING DONE!

Users might lose unsaved data, due to the fact that you cannot make Windows shut down normally.

At next reboot, everything works perfectly again.


/Ubehage
